actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Highway Improvement Act of 1982 to provide additional funds for the completion of certain priority primary projects.

summary.text: Amends the Highway Improvement Act of 1982 to provide that five percent of the amounts authorized for FY 1986 through 1988 for the Federal-aid primary system shall be used to complete certain priority route projects designated in Committee Print No. 97-61 of the House Committee on Public Works and Transportation (including the proposed Corridor Z Priority Primary Route from Kansas City, Missouri, to Brunswick, Georgia).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Highway Improvement Act of 1982 to provide additional funds for the completion of certain priority primary projects.
